sub_topic: Identifying the clique number of a graph.
message_1:
What is the clique number of the graph shown below?

[Insert an image of a graph with nodes and edges]

(Note: The graph should be provided as an image for the student to visually analyze and determine the maximum number of nodes that are pairwise adjacent or connected to each other, i.e., form a clique.)
message_2: Unfortunately, I cannot see or analyze images. Please provide a textual description of the graph, including the number of nodes and their connections, and I will be happy to help you determine the clique number.
